response: "{ \"title\": \"Hard: Fibonacci Tree Sum\", \"description\": \"You are given a binary tree where each node contains an integer value. A Fibonacci-like sequence of numbers is generated from this tree by following these rules:\\n\\n1. The root of the tree becomes the first number in the sequence.\\n2. For any non-leaf node, its value becomes the sum of the values of its children nodes in the sequence.\\n3. Leaf nodes retain their original values.\\n4. Nodes with no children (single-node trees) are considered leaf nodes.\\n\\nWrite a function `fibonacci_tree_sum` that calculates the sum of all numbers in the Fibonacci-like sequence generated from the given binary tree.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef fibonacci_tree_sum(root: TreeNode) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `root` (TreeNode): The root node of a binary tree where each node contains an integer value.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the sum of all numbers in the Fibonacci-like sequence generated from the given binary tree.\", \"code\": \"class TreeNode:\\n    def __init__(self, x):\\n        self.val = x\\n        self.left = None\\n        self.right = None\\n\\ndef fibonacci_tree_sum(root: TreeNode) -> int:\\n    if root is None:\\n        return 0\\n    elif root.left is None and root.right is None:\\n        return root.val\\n    else:\\n        original_value = root.val\\n        root.val = fibonacci_tree_sum(root.left) + fibonacci_tree_sum(root.right)\\n        return root.val + fibonacci_tree_sum(root)\", \"tests\": [\"# Create a binary tree with values 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5\\ntree = TreeNode(1)\\ntree.left = TreeNode(2)\\ntree.right = TreeNode(3)\\ntree.left.left = TreeNode(4)\\ntree.left.right = TreeNode(5)\\nassert fibonacci_tree_sum(tree) == 19\", \"# Create a binary tree with values 2, 7, and 1\\ntree = TreeNode(2)\\ntree.left = TreeNode(7)\\ntree.right = TreeNode(1)\\nassert fibonacci_tree_sum(tree) == 18\"] }"
